QuestData.Title: Near Miss
QuestData.Description: It was either wisdom or luck that prevented you from wearing this choker, $r.$b$bEither way, your acquiring it was no random occurance. You've been targeted by someone, or something....$b$bTake your choker to Bloodrose, here. Let her demonstrate the fate that nearly befell you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Stefan at Ebon Watch wants you to take the Unliving Choker to Bloodrose Datura.
QuestData.RewardText: Now you've observed the fate that was meant to befall you.$b$bAs I mentioned before, this was no coincidence. The creation of such a device is very involved, and the required resources would not be squandered on a random target.$b$bThe simple truth of the matter is this; You're wanted by the Scourge....
